attributes.action: Traffic Calming Petition for Manchester road, Hapton
attributes.additional_details:
We need you the public to sign this petition to ensure some precautions are taken to prevent accidents on Manchester road, Hapton. We want this petition to prevent people from driving dangerously over the bridge. We are hoping that the government here this petition and will deploy a speed camera just before or after the bridge.

I support this Traffic Calming Petition by signing below.
